data.name: MininumSdkVersionMissing
data.value: The minimum .NET SDK version ({0}) is not installed. Please install the .NET SDK and ensure it's available in your PATH.

data.name: InvalidLocaleProvided
data.value: Invalid locale {0} provided will not be used.

data.name: UnsupportedLocaleProvided
data.value: Unsupported locale {0} provided will not be used. Supported locales are: {1}.
data.comment: {1} is a comma-separated list of locales.

data.name: AlreadyConnectedToBackchannel
data.value: Already connected to AppHost backchannel.

data.name: AppHostIncompatibleWithCli
data.value: AppHost is incompatible with the CLI. The AppHost must be updated to a version that supports the {0} capability.

data.name: ExtensionIncompatibleWithCli
data.value: Aspire Extension is incompatible with the CLI. The Extension must be updated to a version that supports the {0} capability.

data.name: CertificatesMayNotBeFullyTrusted
data.value: Developer certificates may not be fully trusted (trust exit code was: {0}).

data.name: FailedToRetrieveCachedTemplatePackages
data.value: Failed to retrieve template packages via cache.

data.name: FailedToSearchForPackages
data.value: Failed to search for packages. Exit code: {0}.

data.name: AppHostWasSpecifiedButDoesntExist
data.value: AppHost file was specified in '{0}' but it does not exist at '{1}'.

data.name: ProjectFileDoesntExist
data.value: Project file does not exist.

data.name: ProjectCouldNotBeAnalyzed
data.value: The project could not be analyzed due to a build error. For more information run with --debug switch.

data.name: ProjectIsNotAppHost
data.value: The project is not an Aspire app host project.

data.name: CouldNotParseAspireSDKVersion
data.value: Could not parse Aspire.Hosting package version.

data.name: AspireSDKVersionNotSupported
data.value: The Aspire.Hosting package version {0} is not supported. Please update to the latest version.

data.name: UnableToRetrieveAssemblyVersion
data.value: Unable to retrieve the assembly version.

data.name: CantUseBothWatchAndNoBuild
data.value: Cannot use --watch and --no-build at the same time.

data.name: FailedToParseTemplateVersionFromStdout
data.value: Failed to parse template version from stdout.

data.name: MultipleProjectFilesFound
data.value: Multiple project files found.

data.name: NoProjectFileFound
data.value: No project file found.

data.name: ProjectFileNotAppHostProject
data.value: Project file is not an Aspire app host project.

data.name: AspireHostingVersionNull
data.value: AspireHostingVersion is null

data.name: ConfigurationKeyRequired
data.value: Configuration key is required.

data.name: ConfigurationValueRequired
data.value: Configuration value is required.

data.name: ConfigurationKeyNotFound
data.value: Configuration key {0} not found.

data.name: ErrorSettingConfiguration
data.value: Error setting configuration: {0}

data.name: ErrorDeletingConfiguration
data.value: Error deleting configuration: {0}

data.name: ExtensionTokenMustBeSet
data.value: The Aspire extension token must be set if ASPIRE_EXTENSION_ENDPOINT is set. Please ensure that ASPIRE_EXTENSION_TOKEN is set
data.comment: Do not localize ASPIRE_EXTENSION_TOKEN and ASPIRE_EXTENSION_ENDPOINT

data.name: InvalidSocketPath
data.value: The provided extension socket path needs two valid parts.

data.name: NoSelectionMade
data.value: Input was required for prompt '{0}' but not provided.
